Olivier, did you see this right after starting Eclipse. We are now restoring 
the type hierarchy in background.

The fix was to add a check if we're aleady disposed when the async exec in ran 
(in TypeHierarchyViewPart.doRestoreInBackground)
verified in code on build I20040611.
